price: “Ko uradi ovo sa bogovima našim”, povikaše oni, “zaista je nasilnik!”
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
